byline.contributor: Alexander Burns, Emma G. Fitzsimmons and Benjamin Mueller contributed reporting.

abstract: Approximately 2,500 law enforcement officers are part of heightened security plan at Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade; extra precautions are taken in light of terrorist attacks in Paris and recent Islamic State propaganda video, though New York City officials report no specific, credible threats.
lead_paragraph: About 2,500 law enforcement officers kept watch over the parade in Manhattan amid heightened alert after the terrorist attacks in Paris.

headline.main: Mixing Whimsy and Prudence at the Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade

snippet: About 2,500 law enforcement officers kept watch over the parade in Manhattan amid heightened alert after the terrorist attacks in Paris.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
